name: SHOmeLOVE
description:
SHO me LOVE (rpg maker)

The Daily life in a small room of neet like 'Shoto-kun' has been changed by An A.I called 'Love-chan' ?

Theme : Semi-visualnovel /Story rich/ Daily life /A.I / Friendship?

Duration : 9days in game (Real time depends on the player)

Endings : 8

Language : Thai

<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3

Hi ! It's my first time making RPG game AAAAAAAAAAAA

so there might be a lot of mistake T   T( you can report bug at the link below )
